YambeURLSplit.description: Where to split the URL to find the page name. Usually either /w/index.php?title= or /wiki/.

YambeBCDelim.description: Character to separate the breadcrumb elements.

YambeOverflowPre.description: Prefix to display if the maximum number of breadcrumb elements is exceeded.

YambeSelfLink.description: If true, the breadcrumb element for the current page will be a link to it, otherwise just plain text.
